trans-unit.source: Defines a point, associated with a user event, to be tracked in the potential execution path of a root workflow instance.
trans-unit.target: Define um ponto, associado a um evento de usuário, a ser rastreado no potencial caminho de execução de uma instância de fluxo de trabalho raiz.

trans-unit.source: This class cannot be inherited.
trans-unit.target: Essa classe não pode ser herdada.

trans-unit.source: An activity designer or a workflow designer may use the overloaded <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Activity.TrackData%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> and <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.ActivityExecutionContext.TrackData%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> methods to instrument the workflow to emit data to the runtime tracking infrastructure as a user event.
trans-unit.target: Um designer de atividade ou um designer de fluxo de trabalho pode usar o sobrecarregado <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Activity.TrackData%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> e <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.ActivityExecutionContext.TrackData%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> métodos para instrumentar o fluxo de trabalho para emitir os dados para o infraestrutura como um evento de usuário de controle de tempo de execução.

trans-unit.source: The data emitted is referred to as user data.
trans-unit.target: Os dados emitidos são referidos como dados de usuário.

trans-unit.source: Unlike activity status events, and workflow status events, which occur only on status changes, user events can occur at any location that is instrumented in a workflow.
trans-unit.target: Ao contrário dos eventos de status de atividade e eventos de status do fluxo de trabalho, que ocorrem apenas em alterações de status, os eventos de usuário podem ocorrer em qualquer local que é instrumentada em um fluxo de trabalho.

trans-unit.source: There are many reasons to instrument a workflow to emit user events.
trans-unit.target: Há muitas razões para instrumentar um fluxo de trabalho para emitir eventos de usuário.

trans-unit.source: For example, a workflow designer may want to communicate logical state information about the progress of a workflow, or an activity designer might want to provide an opportunity to activity members at times other than an activity status change.
trans-unit.target: Por exemplo, um designer de fluxo de trabalho pode querer comunicar informações de estado lógico sobre o andamento de um fluxo de trabalho ou um designer de atividade talvez queira dar a oportunidade de atividade membros às vezes que não seja um status de atividade de alteração.

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackPoint> defines a point of interest in the potential execution path of a root workflow instance associated with a user event.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackPoint> define um ponto de interesse no caminho de execução potencial de uma instância de fluxo de trabalho raiz associado a um evento de usuário.

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackPoint> contains locations that are included in matching, locations that are excluded from matching, and any additional data that should be extracted from the workflow instance when the track point is matched.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackPoint> contém locais que estão incluídos na correspondência, locais serão excluídos da correspondência e dados adicionais que devem ser extraídos da instância de fluxo de trabalho quando o ponto de controle for correspondido.

trans-unit.source: You can add a <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackPoint> to <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingProfile.UserTrackPoints%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> to instruct the runtime tracking infrastructure to send a <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingRecord> to the tracking service when the track point is matched.
trans-unit.target: Você pode adicionar uma <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackPoint> para <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingProfile.UserTrackPoints%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> para instruir o tempo de execução controle infraestrutura para enviar um <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingRecord> para o serviço de controle quando o ponto de controle for correspondido.

trans-unit.source: The user data is returned in <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingRecord.UserData%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>.
trans-unit.target: Os dados do usuário são retornados no <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingRecord.UserData%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>.

trans-unit.source: A single <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackPoint> may be matched at multiple points in the workflow instance.
trans-unit.target: Um único <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackPoint> pode ser correspondido em vários pontos na instância de fluxo de trabalho.

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingLocation> contains match conditions for a location associated with a user event in the potential execution path of a workflow instance.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingLocation> contém condições de correspondência para um local associado a um evento de usuário no caminho de execução potencial de uma instância de fluxo de trabalho.

trans-unit.source: You can add <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingLocation> objects to <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackPoint.MatchingLocations%2A> to define locations that should be included in matching for the track point.
trans-unit.target: Você pode adicionar <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingLocation> objetos <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackPoint.MatchingLocations%2A> para definir os locais que devem ser incluídos na correspondência para o ponto de controle.

trans-unit.source: Similarly, you can add <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingLocation> objects to <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackPoint.ExcludedLocations%2A> to define locations that should be excluded from matching for the track point.
trans-unit.target: Da mesma forma, você pode adicionar <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingLocation> objetos <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackPoint.ExcludedLocations%2A> para definir os locais que devem ser excluídos da correspondência para o ponto de controle.

trans-unit.source: You can add <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityDataTrackingExtract> objects and <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.WorkflowDataTrackingExtract> objects to <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackPoint.Extracts%2A> to specify data that should be extracted from the workflow instance when the track point is matched.
trans-unit.target: Você pode adicionar <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityDataTrackingExtract> objetos e <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.WorkflowDataTrackingExtract> objetos <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackPoint.Extracts%2A> para especificar os dados que devem ser extraídos da instância de fluxo de trabalho quando o ponto de controle for correspondido.

trans-unit.source: The extracted data will be returned in <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingRecord.Body%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>.
trans-unit.target: Os dados extraídos serão retornados no <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingRecord.Body%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>.

trans-unit.source: You can add to <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackPoint.Annotations%2A> to specify additional information associated with the track point.
trans-unit.target: Você pode adicionar a <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackPoint.Annotations%2A> para especificar informações adicionais associadas ao ponto de controle.

trans-unit.source: These annotations will be returned in <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackPoint.Annotations%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>.
trans-unit.target: Essas anotações serão retornadas no <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackPoint.Annotations%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>.

trans-unit.source: For an example of how to use this class, see the [Tracking Using User Track Points Sample](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/d894a18a-a4c6-467e-9a42-8be025ecd4d5).
trans-unit.target: Para obter um exemplo de como usar essa classe, consulte o [controle usando usuário rastrear pontos exemplo](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/d894a18a-a4c6-467e-9a42-8be025ecd4d5).

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackPoint" /> class.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância da classe <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackPoint" />.

trans-unit.source: The default constructor initializes an empty track point.
trans-unit.target: O construtor padrão inicializa um ponto de controle vazio.

trans-unit.source: No matching locations, excluded locations, data extracts or annotations are specified.
trans-unit.target: Nenhuma correspondência locais, excluídos, extrai dados ou locais anotações são especificadas.

trans-unit.source: You must configure the track point by adding at least one <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingLocation> to <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackPoint.MatchingLocations%2A>.
trans-unit.target: Você deve configurar o ponto de controle com a adição de pelo menos um <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingLocation> para <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackPoint.MatchingLocations%2A>.

trans-unit.source: You may optionally add the appropriate objects to <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackPoint.ExcludedLocations%2A>, <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackPoint.Extracts%2A>, and <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackPoint.Annotations%2A>.
trans-unit.target: Opcionalmente, você pode adicionar os objetos apropriados para <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackPoint.ExcludedLocations%2A>, <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackPoint.Extracts%2A>, e <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackPoint.Annotations%2A>.

trans-unit.source: Gets the collection of annotations associated with the track point.
trans-unit.target: Obtém a coleção de anotações associada ao ponto de acompanhamento.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingAnnotationCollection" />.
trans-unit.target: Um <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingAnnotationCollection" />.

trans-unit.source: The default is an empty collection.
trans-unit.target: O padrão é uma coleção vazia.

trans-unit.source: You can add to <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackPoint.Annotations%2A> to specify annotations to be returned in <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackPoint.Annotations%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> when the track point is matched.
trans-unit.target: Você pode adicionar a <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackPoint.Annotations%2A> para especificar as anotações a serem retornados em <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackPoint.Annotations%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> quando o ponto de controle for correspondido.

trans-unit.source: If <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackPoint.Annotations%2A> is empty, no annotations are associated with the track point.
trans-unit.target: Se <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackPoint.Annotations%2A> está vazio, não há anotações são associadas com o ponto de controle.

trans-unit.source: Annotations are `strings` that you define that contain information associated with the track point.
trans-unit.target: As anotações são `strings` definir que contêm informações associadas ao ponto de controle.

trans-unit.source: For example, an annotation could contain information about the possible execution path the workflow can take from this track point, or it could contain information to be displayed in a user interface.
trans-unit.target: Por exemplo, uma anotação pode conter informações sobre o caminho de execução possível o fluxo de trabalho pode levar a partir deste ponto de controle, ou ele pode conter informações a serem exibidas em uma interface de usuário.

trans-unit.source: Gets the collection of locations that should be excluded from the track point by the runtime tracking infrastructure.
trans-unit.target: Obtém a coleção de locais que devem ser excluídos do ponto de controle pela infraestrutura de acompanhamento de tempo de execução.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingLocationCollection" /> that specifies locations to be excluded from the track point.
trans-unit.target: Um <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingLocationCollection" /> que especifica os locais a serem excluídos do ponto de controle.

trans-unit.source: The default is an empty collection.
trans-unit.target: O padrão é uma coleção vazia.

trans-unit.source: If any of the <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingLocation> objects in <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackPoint.ExcludedLocations%2A> is matched for a particular user event, the track point will not be matched and no <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingRecord> will be sent to the tracking service.
trans-unit.target: Se qualquer um do <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingLocation> objetos no <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackPoint.ExcludedLocations%2A> é correspondido para um evento de usuário específico, o ponto de controle não haverá correspondência e não <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingRecord> serão enviadas para o serviço de acompanhamento.

trans-unit.source: If <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackPoint.ExcludedLocations%2A> is empty, there are no excluded locations.
trans-unit.target: Se <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackPoint.ExcludedLocations%2A> está vazio, não existem excluídas localizações.

trans-unit.source: You can use <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackPoint.ExcludedLocations%2A> to exclude specific locations from being tracked by the runtime tracking infrastructure.
trans-unit.target: Você pode usar <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackPoint.ExcludedLocations%2A> para excluir locais específicos do rastreamento em tempo de execução de infra-estrutura de rastreamento.

trans-unit.source: For example, you can exclude a subset of locations that are specified in <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackPoint.MatchingLocations%2A> in order to more precisely refine the locations that should be tracked by the track point.
trans-unit.target: Por exemplo, você pode excluir um subconjunto dos locais especificados em <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackPoint.MatchingLocations%2A> para refinar mais precisamente os locais que devem ser controlados pelo ponto de controle.

trans-unit.source: Gets a collection that specifies data to be extracted from the workflow instance and sent to the tracking service.
trans-unit.target: Obtém uma coleção que especifica os dados a ser extraídos da instância de fluxo de trabalho e enviados para o serviço de acompanhamento.

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ExtractCollection" /> that specifies data to be extracted and sent to the tracking service.
trans-unit.target: Um <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ExtractCollection" /> que especifica os dados a serem extraídos e enviados para o serviço de controle.

trans-unit.source: The default is an empty collection.
trans-unit.target: O padrão é uma coleção vazia.

trans-unit.source: When the track point is matched, the runtime tracking infrastructure sends a <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingRecord> to the tracking service.
trans-unit.target: Quando o ponto de controle for atendido, o tempo de execução controle infraestrutura envia um <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingRecord> para o serviço de acompanhamento.

trans-unit.source: The user data is returned in <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingRecord.UserData%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>.
trans-unit.target: Os dados do usuário são retornados no <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingRecord.UserData%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>.

trans-unit.source: The runtime tracking infrastructure can also extract data specified in <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackPoint.Extracts%2A> from the workflow instance and send this in the <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingRecord>.
trans-unit.target: A infra-estrutura de controle de tempo de execução também pode extrair os dados especificados na <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackPoint.Extracts%2A> do fluxo de trabalho de instância e enviá-lo a <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingRecord>.

trans-unit.source: The extracted data is encapsulated in <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingDataItem> records and returned in <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingRecord.Body%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>.
trans-unit.target: Os dados extraídos são encapsulados em <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingDataItem> registra e retornados em <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingRecord.Body%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>.

trans-unit.source: You can add <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityDataTrackingExtract> objects to <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackPoint.Extracts%2A> to specify member data that should be extracted from the activity associated with the user event and you can add <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.WorkflowDataTrackingExtract> objects to <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackPoint.Extracts%2A> to specify member data that should be extracted from the root activity of the workflow.
trans-unit.target: Você pode adicionar <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityDataTrackingExtract> objetos <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackPoint.Extracts%2A> para especificar dados de membro devem ser extraídos da atividade associada com o evento de usuário e você podem adicionar <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.WorkflowDataTrackingExtract> objetos <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackPoint.Extracts%2A> para especificar dados de membro que devem ser extraídos da atividade raiz do fluxo de trabalho.

trans-unit.source: Gets the collection of locations that should be included in matching for the track point by the runtime tracking infrastructure.
trans-unit.target: Obtém a coleção de locais que devem ser incluídos na correspondência do ponto de controle pela infraestrutura de acompanhamento de tempo de execução.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingLocationCollection" /> that specifies the locations to be matched for the track point.
trans-unit.target: Um <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingLocationCollection" /> que especifica os locais a serem correspondidos para o ponto de controle.

trans-unit.source: The default is an empty collection.
trans-unit.target: O padrão é uma coleção vazia.

trans-unit.source: If <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackPoint.MatchingLocations%2A> is empty, the track point cannot be matched by the runtime tracking infrastructure.
trans-unit.target: Se <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackPoint.MatchingLocations%2A> está vazio, o ponto de controle não pode ser correspondido pelo tempo de execução de infra-estrutura de rastreamento.

trans-unit.source: You must add at least one <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingLocation> to <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackPoint.MatchingLocations%2A> for the <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackPoint> to participate in matching.
trans-unit.target: Você deve adicionar pelo menos um <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingLocation> para <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackPoint.MatchingLocations%2A> para o <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackPoint> para participar na correspondência.

trans-unit.source: The track point will be matched if any of the <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingLocation> objects in <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackPoint.MatchingLocations%2A> is matched and none of the <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingLocation> objects in <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackPoint.ExcludedLocations%2A> is matched.
trans-unit.target: O ponto de controle será correspondido se qualquer uma da <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingLocation> objetos no <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackPoint.MatchingLocations%2A> for correspondida e nenhum do <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingLocation> objetos no <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackPoint.ExcludedLocations%2A> for correspondida.
